title: I forgot my login and email
body:
Hi, my name is  Felipe. I created an account 2/3 years ago due to problems in the server that I play (Brazil), the problem is that I have 6 accs on the Brazilian server, some to play only with a champion or route, so I come to ask for help. Since the times I tried to recover from the riot site, I ended up losing because it does not have this option. I've tried using other options on the site, but I have not had success. I do not remember the full emails only parts of the emails, but I do not remember the login name and possibly the passwords, since most of them are created per table. Type each part remember another email and password, it's a weird kind of method and should be why in 6 years, playing Ragnarok (300 servers, all with different logins), acc smurf in CS, Lague of Legends, should be the first time I have this problem. If any riot could help me would be grateful, I can pass on the other information by mp.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Hot dang that's a lot of Ragnarok accounts! Ya got me beat that's for sure.

If you're still having problems remembering your account info, you can reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account". Once you can answer those questions to verify that you were the account creator those agents will be able to get you back in the game.
